function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Environmental pollutants play a significant role in the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection in polluted environments","Mitigation":"Implement strict environmental pollution control measures and improved waste management","Technologies":"Air and water purification systems, waste treatment technologies","People":"Public in polluted areas, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of adoption of environmentally friendly business practices","Impact":"Continued environmental degradation and health risks from pollution","Mitigation":"Promote and incentivize green business practices, implement regulations and standards for eco-friendly operations","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, sustainable waste management technologies","People":"General public, future generations","Owner":"Businesses, government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to incorporate green marketing in all activities of the firms","Impact":"Inefficient promotion and adoption of eco-friendly products and practices","Mitigation":"Provide education and training on green marketing, integrate green principles into all business processes","Technologies":"Digital marketing tools, sustainability tracking software","People":"Business owners, marketing professionals","Owner":"Companies, marketing agencies"}]}
